name: Deck of Many Things
location: Legendary treasure hoards, planar vaults, fate-touched locations
description:
This infamous collection of cards appears innocuous enoughâ€”thin sheets of ivory or vellum bearing intricate illustrations that shift when viewed from different angles. Each card is connected to fundamental forces of reality, and drawing from the deck attracts the attention of cosmic entities.

Mechanics: Contains 13 or 22 cards. Before drawing, declare how many cards you intend to draw. Each card has powerful, often permanent effects that can dramatically alter a character's fate.

abilities.name: Random Fate
abilities.description: Each card produces powerful effects ranging from beneficial to catastrophic.

name: Portable Hole
location: Dimensional research labs, planar merchants, wizard colleges
description:
This black cloth appears to be a simple handkerchief but unfolds into a six-foot diameter circle. When placed on a solid surface, it creates an extradimensional hole 10 feet deep where items rest in temporal stasis.

Mechanics: Unfolds into a 6-foot diameter circle. Creates an extradimensional hole 10 feet deep on a different plane. Cannot create open passages.

abilities.name: Extradimensional Space
abilities.description: Creates a hole that exists on another plane of existence.

name: Cloak of Displacement
location: Feywild markets, displacer beast lairs, illusion magic academies
description:
This extraordinary garment appears woven from illusion itself, creating a persistent false image of its wearer that appears slightly apart from their true location. The effect makes opponents consistently strike at empty air.

Mechanics: Projects an illusion causing creatures to have disadvantage on attack rolls against you. If you take damage, the effect stops until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Displacement Illusion
abilities.description: Projects false image of your position, making you harder to hit.

name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
location: Ogre strongholds, strength training facilities, warrior guilds
description:
These massive gauntlets are crafted from thick leather treated with giant sinew oils and etched with primitive runes. When worn, they fundamentally transform the wearer's physical capabilities to supernatural levels.

Mechanics: Your Strength score is 19 while you wear these gauntlets. They have no effect if your Strength is already 19 or higher.

abilities.name: Enhanced Strength
abilities.description: Sets Strength to 19, improving physical capabilities.

name: Rope of Climbing
location: Mountaineer supplies, dungeon explorer kits, thieves' guilds
description:
This sixty-foot length of silk rope possesses an almost serpentine quality, moving with fluid motions and responding to voice commands with eagerness. It can tie itself into any knot and find the safest climbing paths.

Mechanics: 60-foot silk rope weighing 3 pounds, holds 3,000 pounds. Speak command word to animate it. Use bonus action to command the other end to move toward a destination.

abilities.name: Animate Rope
abilities.description: Rope moves on command, can tie itself and climb surfaces.

name: Bracers of Defense
location: Monk monasteries, unarmored fighter schools, magical academies
description:
These elegant bracers are forged from a mysterious alloy with intricate geometric patterns. They create an invisible field of force that enhances the wearer's natural defensive abilities to superhuman levels.

Mechanics: You gain a +2 bonus to AC if you are wearing no armor and using no shield.

abilities.name: Unarmored Defense
abilities.description: Provides significant AC bonus for unarmored characters.

name: Crystal Ball
location: Divination towers, oracle temples, fortune teller shops
description:
This perfectly spherical orb of flawless crystal contains swirling silvery mists that reveal images of distant places and people. It acts as a focus for the ancient art of scrying, providing a stable window into the cosmic web.

Mechanics: About 6 inches in diameter. While touching it, you can cast the scrying spell (save DC 17) with it.

abilities.name: Scrying
abilities.description: Cast Scrying spell once per day to observe distant locations.

name: Eyes of the Eagle
location: Ranger outposts, scout training grounds, eagle aeries
description:
These crystal lenses are cut with precision to focus and intensify light, transforming ordinary vision into something approaching the supernatural sight of hunting birds. They enhance visual processing to predatory levels.

Mechanics: Crystal lenses that fit over the eyes. You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and can make out details of distant objects as small as 2 feet across.

abilities.name: Eagle Vision
abilities.description: Dramatically enhances visual perception and distance sight.

name: Flamebrand Sword
location: Fire giant forges, salamander lairs, elemental fire temples
description:
This magnificent longsword has a blade forged from enchanted steel that burns with eternal flames. The crossguard resembles spreading phoenix wings, and the pommel contains a captured fire elemental essence that pulses with inner heat.

Mechanics: +1 magic weapon. On a hit, deals an additional 1d6 fire damage. You can use a bonus action to speak the command word and cause flames to wreath the blade for 1 minute, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius.

abilities.name: Flame Wreath
abilities.description: Bonus action to activate flaming blade that provides light and burns enemies.

abilities.name: Fire Resistance
abilities.description: While attuned, you have resistance to fire damage.

name: Ring of Water Walking
location: Coastal temples, water elemental shrines, merfolk treasuries
description:
This elegant ring is crafted from polished coral and set with a sapphire that constantly swirls with what appears to be trapped seawater. When worn, it grants the wearer supernatural control over their buoyancy and surface tension.

Mechanics: While wearing this ring, you can stand and move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground. This includes water, lava, acid, and other liquids.

abilities.name: Liquid Surface Traversal
abilities.description: Move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground.

name: Boots of Elvenkind
location: Elven courts, forest ranger outposts, fey crossing points
description:
These soft leather boots are crafted from the hide of a celestial deer and stitched with thread spun from moonbeams. They mold perfectly to the wearer's feet and seem to anticipate every step, allowing movement with supernatural grace and silence.

Mechanics: While wearing these boots, your steps make no sound, and you have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

abilities.name: Silent Steps
abilities.description: Move without making any sound with your footsteps.

name: Amulet of the Planes
location: Planar research institutes, ancient wizard towers, extraplanar markets
description:
This complex amulet consists of multiple rotating rings of different metals, each inscribed with symbols representing various planes of existence. At its center lies a small sphere that shifts between different materials - sometimes crystal, sometimes metal, sometimes pure energy.

Mechanics: While wearing this amulet, you can use an action to name a location on another plane of existence and cast the plane shift spell. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

abilities.name: Planar Travel
abilities.description: Cast plane shift spell once per day to travel between planes.

abilities.name: Planar Awareness
abilities.description: Always know which plane of existence you're currently on.

name: Staff of the Python
location: Yuan-ti temples, druid groves, serpent cult sanctuaries
description:
This staff is carved from a single piece of ancient ironwood and shaped to resemble a coiled serpent. The head of the staff features intricate scales and ruby eyes that seem to watch the surroundings with predatory intelligence.

Mechanics: You can use an action to speak the command word and throw the staff on the ground within 10 feet. The staff becomes a giant constrictor snake under your control and acts on its own initiative count.

properties.Duration: 1 hour or until reduced to 0 hit points

abilities.name: Serpent Form
abilities.description: Transform staff into a loyal giant constrictor snake for 1 hour.

abilities.name: Mental Link
abilities.description: Telepathically command the snake while it's within 60 feet.

name: Wand of Magic Missiles
location: Magic item shops, wizard academies, battle mage armories
description:
This slender wand is crafted from polished oak and tipped with a small crystal that pulses with arcane energy. Carved along its length are tiny runes that glow softly when the wand is charged with magical power.

Mechanics: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the magic missile spell. For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Cast magic missile spell using charges to determine spell level.

name: Bag of Tricks
location: Traveling merchant caravans, circus troupes, trickster deity shrines
description:
This ordinary-looking gray bag is made from soft cloth and appears unremarkable at first glance. However, when opened, it reveals a swirling void of grey mist. The bag contains an extradimensional space connected to the Feywild, where various woodland creatures wait to be summoned.

Mechanics: You can use an action to pull a fuzzy object from the bag and throw it 20 feet. The object transforms into a random beast (roll d8) that is friendly to you and your companions.

abilities.name: Summon Beast
abilities.description: Pull out a random friendly animal that helps you for 10 minutes.

name: Potion of Giant Strength
location: Giant strongholds, alchemist laboratories, strength-based training grounds
description:
This thick, crimson potion swirls with golden flecks that seem to pulse with inner power. The liquid has the consistency of honey and emanates a faint warmth. When consumed, it temporarily grants the drinker the legendary strength of giants.

Mechanics: When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect if your Strength is equal to or greater than 23.

abilities.name: Giant's Might
abilities.description: Temporarily gain the incredible strength of giants.

name: Helm of Telepathy
location: Psionicist academies, mind flayer ruins, telepathic research facilities
description:
This ornate helmet is crafted from silvered steel and adorned with intricate engravings of spiraling patterns that seem to shift when viewed directly. A large amethyst crystal is embedded in the center of the forehead plate, pulsing gently with psychic energy.

Mechanics: While wearing this helm, you can use an action to cast the detect thoughts spell (save DC 13). Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

abilities.name: Mind Reading
abilities.description: Cast detect thoughts spell to read surface thoughts of creatures.

abilities.name: Telepathic Communication
abilities.description: Communicate telepathically with any creature within 30 feet that knows a language.

name: Shield of Missile Attraction
location: Cursed armories, battlefield ruins, trickster god temples
description:
This polished steel shield bears an elaborate design of arrows, bolts, and other projectiles carved into its surface. The metal has an unusual lustrous quality that seems to draw the eye - and unfortunately, incoming missiles as well. While protective, it comes with an unexpected drawback.

Mechanics: +2 magic shield. Cursed: While holding this shield, you have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and ranged weapon attacks against you are made with advantage.

abilities.name: Enhanced Protection
abilities.description: Provides superior shield protection with +2 AC bonus.

abilities.name: Missile Magnet (Curse)
abilities.description: Draws ranged attacks and impedes agility. Requires remove curse to unequip.

name: Hammer of the Forge Master
location: Master blacksmith workshops, dwarven forge guilds, fire giant smithies
description:
This magnificent warhammer doubles as both weapon and crafting tool. Forged from meteoric iron and blessed by the forge gods, its head bears intricate runes that glow with inner fire when striking metal. The handle is wrapped in dragonhide leather that never burns.

Mechanics: +1 magic weapon that also functions as masterwork smith's tools. While using this hammer for crafting, you have advantage on all ability checks related to metalworking and reduce crafting time by half.

abilities.name: Perfect Strike
abilities.description: Advantage on all metalworking ability checks when used as a crafting tool.

abilities.name: Forge Blessing
abilities.description: Items crafted with this hammer gain +1 to durability and quality.

name: Bellows of Endless Wind
location: Blacksmith shops, artificer workshops, elemental air shrines
description:
These leather bellows are reinforced with bands of enchanted steel and connected to a small air elemental bound within. They never require manual pumping and can maintain any desired temperature in a forge indefinitely.

Mechanics: When attached to a forge, these bellows automatically maintain optimal airflow. The forge reaches desired temperatures in half the normal time and maintains perfect heat without attention.

abilities.name: Perpetual Airflow
abilities.description: Provides continuous, controlled air supply to any forge.

abilities.name: Temperature Mastery
abilities.description: Maintains exact forge temperatures without fluctuation.

name: Anvil of True Shaping
location: Legendary smithies, dwarven clan treasuries, divine forge chambers
description:
This massive anvil is carved from a single block of adamantine and inscribed with creation runes in every known language. It radiates an aura of perfect craftsmanship and seems to guide the smith's hand toward ideal forms.

Mechanics: When working at this anvil, all metalworking checks are made with advantage, and you can attempt to craft items that would normally be beyond your skill level. Once per day, you can automatically succeed on one crafting check.

abilities.name: Master's Guidance
abilities.description: Advantage on all metalworking checks and ability to craft beyond normal skill level.

abilities.name: Flawless Strike
abilities.description: Once per day, automatically succeed on any crafting ability check.

name: Tongs of Elemental Grasping
location: Elemental forges, magical smithies, artificer colleges
description:
These masterwork tongs are crafted from enchanted steel with grips wrapped in salamander leather. They can safely handle any material regardless of temperature and seem to anticipate the smith's needs.

Mechanics: These tongs can safely grasp and manipulate any material, regardless of temperature, magical properties, or hazardous nature. They extend your reach by 5 feet when crafting.

abilities.name: Universal Grip
abilities.description: Safely handle any material regardless of temperature or magical properties.

abilities.name: Precise Control
abilities.description: Gain fine manipulation abilities even with extremely hot or dangerous materials.

name: Apron of the Forge Guardian
location: Master smiths' personal gear, forge safety equipment vendors, fire giant workshops
description:
This heavy leather apron is reinforced with overlapping scales of red dragon hide and blessed with protective ward runes. It provides both physical protection and magical defenses specifically tailored for forge work.

Mechanics: While wearing this apron, you have resistance to fire damage and advantage on saving throws against effects that would damage or destroy crafted items. AC 12 + Dex modifier (max 2).

properties.Craft Protection: Advantage on saves to protect crafted items

abilities.name: Forge Ward
abilities.description: Resistance to fire damage and protection from forge-related hazards.

abilities.name: Artisan's Shield
abilities.description: Magical protection extends to items you're crafting, preventing damage from accidents.

name: Crucible of Infinite Metals
location: Legendary smithies, planar trading posts, elemental earth temples
description:
This large crucible appears to be made of dark volcanic glass but is actually forged from crystallized earth elemental essence. When activated, it can produce any common metal in unlimited quantities, and rare metals in limited amounts.

Mechanics: Once per day, you can command the crucible to produce up to 100 pounds of common metals (iron, copper, tin) or 10 pounds of uncommon metals (silver, gold, platinum) or 1 pound of rare metals (mithril, adamantine).

abilities.name: Metal Creation
abilities.description: Generate any type of metal based on rarity limits once per day.

abilities.name: Pure Quality
abilities.description: All metals produced are of perfect purity and quality.

name: Quenching Basin of Perfect Cooling
location: Professional smithies, weapon crafting guilds, magical tool vendors
description:
This wide stone basin is carved from a single piece of glacier ice that never melts. The water within remains at the perfect temperature for quenching any metal, automatically adjusting to provide optimal cooling rates.

Mechanics: Any metal item quenched in this basin is cooled at the perfect rate, preventing warping, cracking, or other cooling-related defects. Items quenched here gain +1 to durability.

abilities.name: Optimal Quenching
abilities.description: Provides perfect cooling rates to prevent defects in crafted items.

abilities.name: Enhanced Durability
abilities.description: Items quenched here are more resistant to wear and damage.

name: Lens of Flaw Detection
location: Quality control stations, master craftsmen's tools, artificer laboratories
description:
This crystal magnifying lens is ground from pure divination crystal and set in a frame of enchanted silver. When looking through it, even the smallest imperfections in crafted items become clearly visible as glowing lines of colored light.

Mechanics: While looking through this lens, you can instantly detect any flaws, weaknesses, or defects in crafted items. You gain advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks to assess item quality and can determine an item's exact durability and structural integrity.

abilities.name: Perfect Vision
abilities.description: See through illusions and detect any hidden flaws in crafted items.

abilities.name: Structural Analysis
abilities.description: Instantly understand the complete structural integrity of any item.

name: Gloves of Steady Hands
location: Fine craftsmen's workshops, jeweler's guilds, precision tool vendors
description:
These supple leather gloves are stitched with silver thread in intricate patterns that seem to stabilize the wearer's movements. Tiny gems embedded in the fingertips pulse with a calming magical aura.

Mechanics: While wearing these gloves, your hands never shake or tremble, and you have advantage on all Dexterity-based ability checks involving fine motor control, including crafting delicate items.

abilities.name: Unwavering Precision
abilities.description: Advantage on all Dexterity checks requiring fine motor control.

abilities.name: Artisan's Grace
abilities.description: Can work on extremely delicate projects without risk of accidental damage.

name: Forge of Endless Flame
location: Divine smithies, primordial fire temples, legendary craftsmen's workshops
description:
This massive forge appears to contain a captive star at its heart, burning with flames that have never been extinguished since the dawn of creation. The fire within burns at any desired temperature and can smelt any known material.

Mechanics: This forge burns eternally without fuel and can reach any temperature instantly. It can smelt any material, including magical metals and extraplanar substances. Items forged here gain a permanent +1 enhancement bonus and count as magical.

abilities.name: Divine Crafting
abilities.description: All items forged here automatically gain +1 enhancement and magical properties.

abilities.name: Planar Metallurgy
abilities.description: Can work with materials from any plane of existence.

abilities.name: Masterwork Creation
abilities.description: Once per month, can create an item of up to Very Rare quality.

name: Mirror of Past Reflections
location: Ancient libraries, divination towers, historian's studies
description:
This ornate hand mirror has a frame of tarnished silver engraved with swirling temporal runes. Its surface shows not your current reflection, but glimpses of your past selves and the echoes of events that occurred in its presence.

Mechanics: Once per day, you can gaze into the mirror and witness any event that occurred within 30 feet of the mirror's current location within the past 24 hours, viewing it as if you were present.

abilities.name: Historical Sight
abilities.description: View any event that occurred near the mirror within the past day.

abilities.name: Past Self Glimpses
abilities.description: Occasionally see reflections of your past experiences and decisions.

name: Cloak of Many Fashions
location: Fashion boutiques, noble courts, theatrical costume shops
description:
This remarkable garment appears to be a simple traveling cloak, but its fabric shimmers with subtle magical threads. At the wearer's command, it can transform into any style of clothing appropriate for any social situation or climate.

Mechanics: As an action, you can command the cloak to change into any set of clothing, from peasant garb to noble finery. The clothing is always perfectly fitted and appropriate for the current weather.

abilities.name: Fashion Transformation
abilities.description: Transform into any style of clothing from any culture or social class.

abilities.name: Social Camouflage
abilities.description: Gain advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks to blend into social situations.

name: Candle of Truth Telling
location: Courtrooms, interrogation chambers, temples of justice
description:
This white candle is made from the rendered fat of a celestial creature and burns with a pure, steady flame that never flickers. Its light has the power to compel honesty from those within its illumination.

Mechanics: When lit, creatures within 10 feet of the candle must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 13) when they attempt to tell a deliberate lie. On a failure, they must speak the truth or remain silent.

abilities.name: Compel Truth
abilities.description: Forces creatures to make saves when attempting to lie in the candle's light.

abilities.name: Detect Deception
abilities.description: The flame flickers and dims when someone successfully lies nearby.

name: Bottle of Boundless Air
location: Underwater ruins, air elemental shrines, deep mining operations
description:
This crystal bottle contains what appears to be ordinary air, but it holds an extradimensional pocket connected to the Elemental Plane of Air. The bottle never empties and provides an unlimited supply of fresh, breathable air.

Mechanics: You can drink from this bottle to breathe normally in any environment for 1 hour. Multiple creatures can share the air by each taking a drink. The bottle refills instantly after each use.

abilities.name: Eternal Breath
abilities.description: Provides breathable air in any environment, including underwater or in toxic atmospheres.

abilities.name: Shared Respiration
abilities.description: Multiple creatures can benefit by each taking a drink from the bottle.

name: Compass of Desire
location: Treasure hunter guilds, explorer's societies, wish-granting locations
description:
This brass compass has an ornate face inscribed with symbols representing various desires and needs. Instead of pointing north, its needle points toward whatever the attuned user most desires at the moment.

Mechanics: While holding the compass, you can concentrate on something you desire. The needle will point in the direction of the closest example of that thing within 1 mile, if one exists.

properties.Desire Tracking: Points to whatever you most want

abilities.name: Heart's Direction
abilities.description: Points toward whatever you most desire within range.

abilities.name: Specific Seeking
abilities.description: Can focus on particular objects, people, or concepts when concentrating.

name: Tankard of Endless Ale
location: Taverns, breweries, dwarven halls, festival grounds
description:
This sturdy pewter tankard is etched with images of hops, barley, and singing dwarves. No matter how much you drink from it, it always remains full of perfectly crafted ale that matches the drinker's preferred taste.

Mechanics: This tankard always contains fresh, high-quality ale that tastes exactly how the current drinker prefers. The ale provides the same nourishment as food and water for one meal per day.

properties.Nutritional Value: Counts as one meal per day

abilities.name: Endless Refreshment
abilities.description: Provides unlimited ale that perfectly matches the drinker's taste preferences.

abilities.name: Sustaining Brew
abilities.description: The magical ale can substitute for one meal per day when consumed.

name: Bed of Restful Sleep
location: Luxury inns, healing temples, noble bedchambers, rest shrines
description:
This comfortable bed appears to be made of the finest materials, with a mattress that perfectly conforms to any sleeper. The bed radiates an aura of peace and tranquility that promotes deep, restorative sleep.

Mechanics: Anyone who sleeps in this bed for at least 4 hours gains the benefits of a long rest. Additionally, they recover from one level of exhaustion and gain temporary hit points equal to their level that last until their next long rest.

properties.Temporary HP: Gain temp HP equal to level

abilities.name: Perfect Rest
abilities.description: Provides complete rest benefits in half the normal time.

abilities.name: Rejuvenating Dreams
abilities.description: Sleep grants additional healing and removes exhaustion.

name: Jar of Preserving
location: Alchemist shops, food storage facilities, preservation labs
description:
This large glass jar has an airtight lid inscribed with preservation runes. Anything placed inside enters a state of temporal stasis, remaining exactly as it was when sealed, regardless of how much time passes.

Mechanics: Any organic matter placed in this jar stops aging, decaying, or changing in any way. Food remains fresh, wounds don't heal or worsen, and even living creatures enter suspended animation.

abilities.name: Temporal Suspension
abilities.description: Places any organic matter in complete temporal stasis.

abilities.name: Perfect Preservation
abilities.description: Prevents all forms of deterioration, aging, or change.

name: Book of Endless Stories
location: Grand libraries, storyteller guilds, entertainment venues, bardic colleges
description:
This leather-bound tome appears to contain only blank pages at first glance, but when opened with intent, it fills with whatever story the reader most wants to experience. The words and illustrations move and change as the tale unfolds.

Mechanics: Once per day, you can open the book and experience any story you desire. While reading, you gain inspiration and advantage on your next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

properties.Interactive Reading: Words and images move on pages

abilities.name: Living Literature
abilities.description: Generates any story you wish to read with moving text and illustrations.

abilities.name: Inspiring Tales
abilities.description: Reading grants inspiration and advantage on your next d20 roll.

name: Cloak of Useful Things
location: Utility shops, adventurer outfitters, practical magic vendors
description:
This practical brown cloak has dozens of small pockets and patches sewn into its inner lining. Each patch can be pulled off to reveal a common item that might be needed in everyday situations.

Mechanics: Three times per day, you can pull a patch from the cloak to produce any common, mundane item worth 1 gp or less (rope, candle, chalk, etc.). The cloak regrows these patches at dawn.

abilities.name: Mundane Creation
abilities.description: Produce any common item worth 1 gp or less from the cloak's patches.

abilities.name: Daily Renewal
abilities.description: The cloak regenerates its magical patches each dawn.

name: Stone of Gravity Control
location: Floating cities, gravity research labs, elemental earth temples
description:
This smooth, spherical stone appears to be made of condensed starlight and feels surprisingly heavy for its size. It pulses with gravitational energy and allows the wielder to manipulate gravitational forces in localized areas.

Mechanics: As an action, you can alter gravity in a 30-foot radius centered on you for 1 minute. You can make gravity lighter (creatures can jump twice as far), heavier (movement speed halved), or reversed (creatures fall upward). Usable once per long rest.

abilities.name: Gravitational Manipulation
abilities.description: Alter gravity effects in a large area for tactical advantage.

abilities.name: Directional Control
abilities.description: Can reverse gravity to make creatures and objects fall upward.

name: Lantern of Revealing Light
location: Investigation bureaus, guard stations, truth-seeking temples
description:
This brass lantern burns with a clear, white flame that illuminates more than just the physical world. Its light reveals hidden truths and exposes that which is concealed from normal sight.

Mechanics: While lit, this lantern's light reveals invisible creatures and objects, illusions appear translucent, and hidden doors or compartments glow with a faint outline within its 30-foot radius of bright light.

abilities.name: True Sight Illumination
abilities.description: Reveals invisible creatures, hidden objects, and makes illusions translucent.

abilities.name: Secret Detection
abilities.description: Hidden doors, compartments, and passages glow with faint outlines.

name: Coin of Fate's Fortune
location: Gambling houses, fate temples, luck shrines, chance encounters
description:
This golden coin bears the image of a smiling face on one side and a frowning face on the other. It feels warm to the touch and seems to pulse with the rhythm of destiny itself.

Mechanics: Once per day, you can flip this coin before making an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. Call heads or tails - if you guess correctly, you have advantage on the roll. If wrong, you have disadvantage.

properties.Luck Gamble: Advantage or disadvantage based on guess

abilities.name: Fortune's Gamble
abilities.description: Risk disadvantage for the chance of advantage on important rolls.

abilities.name: Destiny's Call
abilities.description: The coin seems to influence fate itself when flipped.

name: Box of Infinite Scrolls
location: Ancient libraries, wizard towers, magical archives, scribal academies
description:
This ornate wooden box is inlaid with silver runes and contains an extradimensional space filled with magical scrolls. The box somehow anticipates the user's needs and produces relevant scrolls when opened.

Mechanics: Once per day, you can open the box and find a spell scroll of a spell you know of 3rd level or lower. Once per week, you can find a scroll of a 4th or 5th level spell you know.

abilities.name: Responsive Archive
abilities.description: Produces spell scrolls of spells you know when you need them most.

abilities.name: Anticipatory Magic
abilities.description: The box seems to predict which scrolls will be most useful.

name: Carpet of Comfort
location: Nomad camps, traveling merchants, comfort item vendors
description:
This richly woven carpet displays intricate patterns that seem to shift and flow when viewed from different angles. When laid out, it creates a zone of perfect comfort regardless of the surrounding environment.

Mechanics: When spread out, this 10-foot by 10-foot carpet creates a zone where the temperature is always comfortable, the ground is soft, and light rain or snow doesn't penetrate. Sleeping on it provides all the comfort of a fine bed.

abilities.name: Environmental Comfort
abilities.description: Creates a zone of perfect climate and comfort in any environment.

abilities.name: Restful Surface
abilities.description: Provides the comfort of a luxurious bed anywhere it's placed.

name: Prism of Light Splitting
location: Optical laboratories, light temples, rainbow bridges, crystal caves
description:
This perfectly cut crystal prism refracts light in impossible ways, creating rainbows that seem to exist in three dimensions. It can separate not just light but also magical energies and effects.

Mechanics: As an action, you can point the prism at a spell effect or magical aura and split it into component parts. This allows you to redirect half of a spell's effect to a different target, or separate beneficial effects from harmful ones.

abilities.name: Magic Refraction
abilities.description: Split spell effects and redirect portions to different targets.

abilities.name: Effect Separation
abilities.description: Separate beneficial effects from harmful ones in complex spells.

name: Hourglass of Borrowed Time
location: Time research facilities, temporal anomalies, chronomancer towers
description:
This elegant hourglass contains sand that flows upward and downward simultaneously in an impossible display of temporal manipulation. The sand seems to sparkle with captured moments from across time.

Mechanics: Once per long rest, you can flip the hourglass to gain an extra action on your turn for the next minute. However, after the effect ends, you are stunned for one round as time catches up with you.

abilities.name: Temporal Acceleration
abilities.description: Gain an extra action each turn for one minute.

abilities.name: Time Debt
abilities.description: Must pay the price of borrowed time with temporary stunning.

name: Paintbrush of Living Art
location: Artist studios, creative academies, imagination workshops, fey galleries
description:
This fine paintbrush has bristles made from phoenix feathers and a handle carved from a treant's branch. Whatever it paints becomes temporarily real, bringing imagination into physical existence.

Mechanics: You can paint simple objects or creatures on any surface. These paintings become real for 1 hour, with the limitations that they can't be larger than Medium size and can't have more than 2 hit dice. Usable once per day.

abilities.name: Artistic Creation
abilities.description: Paint objects or simple creatures that become temporarily real.

abilities.name: Imagination Manifestation
abilities.description: Bring your artistic vision into physical reality for a limited time.

name: Keyring of Universal Access
location: Locksmith guilds, thieves' dens, security companies, master key vaults
description:
This simple iron keyring holds exactly seven keys that constantly shift and change their shapes. Each key can transform to open any lock, though each has its own personality and preferences for certain types of barriers.

Mechanics: As an action, you can select one key to attempt to open any lock. Make a Dexterity check with proficiency bonus, adding different modifiers based on which key you choose (+1 to +5 depending on lock complexity).

abilities.name: Adaptive Unlocking
abilities.description: Keys reshape themselves to fit any lock mechanism.

abilities.name: Master Access
abilities.description: Different keys provide different bonuses for various types of locks.

name: Satchel of Endless Provision
location: Traveling supply stores, expedition outfitters, survival gear vendors
description:
This worn leather satchel appears ordinary but contains an extradimensional space connected to a realm of infinite basic supplies. It can provide essential items for survival and daily life.

Mechanics: Three times per day, you can reach into the satchel and pull out any basic survival item worth 5 sp or less (rations, rope, blanket, torch, etc.). The items are mundane but perfectly functional.

abilities.name: Survival Provision
abilities.description: Provides basic survival items when needed most.

abilities.name: Endless Supply
abilities.description: Never runs out of basic necessities for adventuring.

name: Boots of Mud Walking
location: Swamp villages, marsh ranger outposts, bog witch huts
description:
These sturdy leather boots are treated with oils from bog moss and sealed with waterproof wax. They allow the wearer to traverse muddy, swampy terrain with ease, never getting stuck or slipping.

Mechanics: While wearing these boots, you ignore difficult terrain caused by mud, swamp water, or similar wet, soft ground. You also have advantage on saving throws against being knocked prone on such terrain.

properties.Stability: Advantage vs prone on wet ground

abilities.name: Swamp Stride
abilities.description: Move normally through muddy and swampy terrain without impediment.

abilities.name: Sure Footing
abilities.description: Advantage on saves against being knocked prone on wet, muddy surfaces.

name: Cloak of Billowing
location: Theatrical costume shops, dramatic performer guilds, vanity merchants
description:
This dramatic cloak is made from fine silk that catches the wind in the most flattering ways. It always billows heroically behind the wearer, creating an impressive silhouette regardless of wind conditions.

Mechanics: The cloak billows dramatically on command (no action required). While billowing, you have advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) and Charisma (Performance) checks. The effect is purely cosmetic but psychologically impactful.

abilities.name: Heroic Billow
abilities.description: Command the cloak to billow dramatically, enhancing your presence and charisma.

abilities.name: Wind Independence
abilities.description: Billows perfectly regardless of actual wind conditions.

name: Hat of Disguise
location: Spy networks, actor guilds, disguise kit vendors, thieves' markets
description:
This unremarkable hat can transform into any style of headwear and subtly alters the wearer's facial features to create convincing disguises. The magic is subtle enough to fool casual observation.

Mechanics: While wearing this hat, you can use an action to cast disguise self at will. The spell ends if the hat is removed.

abilities.name: Perfect Disguise
abilities.description: Cast disguise self at will while wearing the hat.

abilities.name: Adaptive Headwear
abilities.description: Hat automatically transforms to match your chosen disguise.

name: Sending Stones (Pair)
location: Communication networks, merchant caravans, military outposts, mage colleges
description:
These two smooth stones are carved from the same piece of mineral and maintain a mystical connection across any distance. They enable instant communication between holders, making them invaluable for coordinating activities.

Mechanics: While holding one stone, you can use an action to cast the sending spell to the holder of the other stone. Each stone can be used once per day, and the spell only works between the paired stones.

properties.Paired Connection: Only works between the two stones

abilities.name: Instant Messaging
abilities.description: Send a 25-word message instantly to the holder of the paired stone.

abilities.name: Planar Communication
abilities.description: Works even across different planes of existence.

name: Immovable Rod
location: Engineering workshops, construction sites, puzzle dungeons, utility vendors
description:
This flat iron rod has a small button on one end. When the button is pressed, the rod becomes magically fixed in place, defying gravity and remaining absolutely stationary until the button is pressed again.

Mechanics: As an action, you can press the button to fix the rod in place. It hovers in the air and can support up to 8,000 pounds. Another action pressing the button releases it.

properties.Positioning: Fixes in exact position in space

abilities.name: Absolute Position
abilities.description: Becomes completely immovable when activated, defying gravity.

abilities.name: Heavy Load Bearer
abilities.description: Can support tremendous weight while activated.

name: Eversmoking Bottle
location: Alchemist shops, siege equipment stores, military supply depots
description:
This brass bottle contains compressed smoke from the Elemental Plane of Air. When uncorked, it releases a thick cloud of harmless but obscuring smoke that provides excellent cover for tactical maneuvers.

Mechanics: As an action, you can remove the stopper and create a 20-foot radius sphere of thick smoke centered on the bottle. The smoke lasts for 1 hour or until dispersed by wind. The bottle can be used once per day.

abilities.name: Tactical Concealment
abilities.description: Create a large area of thick smoke for cover and concealment.

abilities.name: Harmless Smoke
abilities.description: Smoke blocks vision but doesn't cause damage or breathing problems.

name: Alchemy Jug
location: Alchemist laboratories, tavern supply rooms, magical convenience stores
description:
This ceramic jug appears unremarkable, but it can produce a variety of liquids on command. The jug seems to draw these substances from elemental planes and pocket dimensions.

Mechanics: You can speak the jug's command word and name one liquid from its list to produce up to 2 gallons per day. Liquids include water, wine, beer, oil, vinegar, and various other common substances.

abilities.name: Liquid Production
abilities.description: Produce various useful liquids including water, oil, wine, and vinegar.

abilities.name: Daily Renewal
abilities.description: Regains the ability to produce liquids each dawn.

name: Bag of Holding
location: Adventuring supply stores, magical storage facilities, dimensional merchants
description:
This appears to be a common cloth sack about 2 feet by 4 feet in size. The bag opens into a nondimensional space that is larger inside than outside, providing convenient storage for adventuring gear.

Mechanics: The bag can hold up to 500 pounds, not exceeding a volume of 64 cubic feet. The bag weighs 15 pounds, regardless of its contents. Retrieving an item requires an action.

abilities.name: Extradimensional Storage
abilities.description: Store far more than the bag's apparent size should allow.

abilities.name: Weight Reduction
abilities.description: Contents don't add to the bag's weight beyond the base 15 pounds.

name: Driftglobe
location: Illumination specialists, underground exploration suppliers, magical lighting stores
description:
This small glass sphere contains swirling luminescent gas that responds to verbal commands. It can provide light and even float freely, making it an excellent hands-free light source for adventurers.

Mechanics: Speaking the command word causes it to shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for another 20 feet. You can command it to float and follow you. Saying 'daylight' causes it to cast the daylight spell once per day.

abilities.name: Floating Illumination
abilities.description: Provides hands-free light that follows you around.

abilities.name: Daylight Burst
abilities.description: Cast daylight spell once per day for intense illumination.

name: Decanter of Endless Water
location: Desert survival suppliers, ship provisioning stores, agricultural magic vendors
description:
This stoppered flask sloshes when shaken, as if it contains water. The decanter weighs 2 pounds and connects to an endless reservoir on the Elemental Plane of Water.

Mechanics: You can use an action to remove the stopper and speak one of three command words: 'Stream' produces 1 gallon of water, 'Fountain' produces 5 gallons, and 'Geyser' produces 30 gallons that can knock creatures prone.

abilities.name: Unlimited Water
abilities.description: Produce fresh water in varying quantities on command.

abilities.name: Pressurized Blast
abilities.description: Geyser mode can knock down creatures with water pressure.

name: Boots of the Winterlands
location: Arctic exploration outfitters, cold weather gear vendors, northern settlements
description:
These furred boots are snug and feel quite warm. While wearing them, you gain resistance to cold damage, and cold weather doesn't impose any drawbacks on your travel or survival.

Mechanics: Resistance to cold damage. You ignore difficult terrain created by ice or snow, and you can tolerate temperatures as low as âˆ’50 degrees Fahrenheit without protection.

properties.Ice Walking: Ignore ice and snow difficult terrain

abilities.name: Arctic Adaptation
abilities.description: Completely comfortable in extreme cold and resistant to cold damage.

abilities.name: Sure Ice Footing
abilities.description: Move normally across ice and snow without slipping or slowing.

name: Cloak of Protection
location: Protective gear vendors, guardian temples, military quartermaster stores
description:
This fine cloak is woven with protective wards and blessed by benevolent spirits. It shimmers faintly with defensive magic that turns aside attacks and bolsters the wearer's natural defenses.

Mechanics: While wearing this cloak, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

abilities.name: Defensive Ward
abilities.description: Provides a constant protective bonus to both AC and saving throws.

abilities.name: Universal Aegis
abilities.description: Protection applies against all forms of attacks and harmful effects.

name: Winged Boots
location: Aerial courier services, mountain climbing suppliers, sky temple gift shops
description:
These leather boots have small wings attached at the heels that flutter and beat when activated. They grant the wearer the power of flight for limited periods, though they require rest between uses.

Mechanics: While wearing these boots, you can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet for 4 hours. The flying speed becomes 0 if you exceed the weight limit of 300 pounds. You can use this feature once per day.

abilities.name: Temporary Flight
abilities.description: Gain the ability to fly for several hours once per day.

abilities.name: Weight Restriction
abilities.description: Flight fails if you exceed the maximum weight capacity.

name: Periapt of Health
location: Healing temples, disease prevention clinics, medical supply vendors
description:
This amulet is carved from a single piece of pristine jade and blessed by deities of health and purity. It provides robust protection against diseases and poisons that would otherwise harm the wearer.

Mechanics: While wearing this amulet, you are immune to contracting any disease. If you are already diseased when you don it, the effects are suppressed until you remove it.

abilities.name: Disease Ward
abilities.description: Complete immunity to all forms of disease while wearing the amulet.

abilities.name: Purifying Presence
abilities.description: Suppresses the effects of existing diseases without curing them.

name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
location: Athletic equipment stores, explorer outfitters, aquatic gear specialists
description:
These leather gloves have webbing between the fingers and tiny hooks embedded in the palms. They enhance the wearer's natural climbing and swimming abilities to superhuman levels.

Mechanics: While wearing these gloves, your climbing speed and swimming speed are equal to your walking speed, and you gain a +5 bonus to Strength (Athletics) checks made to climb or swim.

abilities.name: Enhanced Mobility
abilities.description: Move at full speed while climbing or swimming.

abilities.name: Superior Grip
abilities.description: Significant bonus to all climbing and swimming athletic checks.

name: Ring of Mind Shielding
location: Mental protection specialists, anti-telepathy vendors, privacy consultants
description:
This simple band of metal contains intricate mental wards that protect the wearer's thoughts from intrusion. It provides immunity to magical attempts to read or influence the mind.

Mechanics: You are immune to any effect that would sense your emotions, read your thoughts, or determine your location by divination magic. If you die while wearing this ring, your soul enters it and can communicate telepathically with any creature wearing it.

abilities.name: Mental Fortress
abilities.description: Complete protection against telepathic intrusion and mind-affecting divination.

abilities.name: Soul Sanctuary
abilities.description: Upon death, soul can reside in the ring and communicate with future wearers.

name: Pearl of Power
location: Arcane academies, spell component suppliers, magical energy vendors
description:
This lustrous pearl contains concentrated magical energy that can restore a spellcaster's expended power. It glows faintly when touched by someone with magical ability.

Mechanics: While holding this pearl, you can use an action to speak its command word and regain one expended spell slot of 3rd level or lower. Once used, the pearl can't be used again until the next dawn.

abilities.name: Magical Restoration
abilities.description: Restore an expended spell slot once per day.

abilities.name: Energy Condensation
abilities.description: Contains concentrated magical energy in a portable form.

name: Stone of Good Luck
location: Gambling houses, luck charm vendors, fortune teller shops
description:
This polished stone seems to shimmer with favorable fortune. While in your possession, it subtly nudges probability in your favor, making beneficial outcomes slightly more likely.

Mechanics: While this stone is on your person, you gain a +1 bonus to ability checks and saving throws.

abilities.name: Fortune's Favor
abilities.description: Constant bonus to ability checks and saving throws while carried.

abilities.name: Probability Nudge
abilities.description: Subtly influences random chance in the bearer's favor.

name: Folding Boat
location: Nautical supply stores, transportation specialists, magical convenience vendors
description:
This small wooden box transforms into a full-sized boat when activated. The transformation is nearly instantaneous and the boat is sturdy enough for ocean travel.

Mechanics: You can use an action to speak the command word and unfold the box into a boat 10 feet long, 4 feet wide, and 2 feet deep. It can hold up to four Medium creatures comfortably. Speaking the command word again folds it back into a box.

abilities.name: Instant Vessel
abilities.description: Transform from a small box into a fully functional boat.

abilities.name: Compact Storage
abilities.description: Easily portable when folded, taking up minimal space.

name: Necklace of Adaptation
location: Environmental gear suppliers, survival equipment stores, planar travel agencies
description:
This necklace features a pendant made from crystallized air that allows the wearer to breathe normally in any environment. It's invaluable for underwater exploration or traveling through toxic atmospheres.

Mechanics: While wearing this necklace, you can breathe normally in any environment, and you have advantage on saving throws made against harmful gases and vapors.

abilities.name: Atmospheric Adaptation
abilities.description: Breathe normally underwater, in toxic air, or in airless environments.

abilities.name: Vapor Ward
abilities.description: Enhanced resistance to poisonous gases and harmful atmospheric effects.

name: Ledger of Honest Accounts
location: Merchant guilds, accounting firms, tax collection offices, honest trader shops
description:
This leather-bound ledger keeps perfect records of all financial transactions conducted near it. The pages fill themselves with precise accounting information, and the book can detect attempts at financial fraud or deception.

Mechanics: All monetary transactions within 30 feet are automatically recorded. When reviewing transactions, you can detect if any party was attempting to deceive about money, prices, or trade goods. The ledger shows true values of items.

abilities.name: Perfect Bookkeeping
abilities.description: Automatically maintains accurate financial records of all nearby transactions.

abilities.name: Deception Detection
abilities.description: Reveals when someone is lying about prices, values, or financial matters.

name: Scales of Fair Trade
location: Merchant scales vendors, fair trade organizations, honest weight inspectors
description:
These ornate brass scales are enchanted to always show the true weight and value of items placed upon them. They cannot be fooled by illusions, transmutation magic, or clever counterfeits.

Mechanics: The scales show the exact weight and true value of any item placed on them. They can see through illusions that would disguise an item's nature and reveal if items are magically altered or counterfeit.

abilities.name: Honest Measurement
abilities.description: Provides accurate weight and value assessment immune to magical deception.

abilities.name: Counterfeit Detection
abilities.description: Instantly identifies fake or magically altered goods.

name: Coin Purse of Endless Change
location: Banking institutions, money changer shops, merchant convenience stores
description:
This leather coin purse always contains the exact change needed for any transaction, converting between different denominations of currency automatically. It never runs out of small coins for making change.

Mechanics: The purse can break down larger denominations into smaller ones without limit. It always provides exact change for any transaction up to the total value of coins placed inside it. The purse doesn't create money, only converts it.

abilities.name: Perfect Change Making
abilities.description: Always provides exact change for any transaction from existing coin value.

abilities.name: Currency Conversion
abilities.description: Automatically converts between different coin denominations as needed.

name: Display Case of Preservation
location: Luxury shops, museum supply vendors, preservation specialists, high-end retailers
description:
This elegant glass display case keeps items in perfect condition indefinitely while making them clearly visible to customers. Items inside never decay, tarnish, or lose their quality, maintaining their appeal forever.

Mechanics: Items placed inside are preserved in perfect condition and cannot deteriorate. The case provides a +5 bonus to the perceived value of displayed items for sale purposes and prevents theft (DC 20 Investigation to find the hidden lock).

abilities.name: Eternal Preservation
abilities.description: Keep displayed items in perfect, unchanging condition forever.

abilities.name: Enhanced Appeal
abilities.description: Items appear more valuable and desirable when displayed inside.

name: Register of Customer Memory
location: Customer service training centers, hospitality suppliers, memory enhancement vendors
description:
This ornate book automatically records information about every customer who enters the shop. It helps shopkeepers remember preferences, purchase history, and important details about their clientele.

Mechanics: The book records basic information about anyone who enters your shop including appearance, name (if given), and purchases made. You can recall any customer's information perfectly and gain advantage on Charisma checks with repeat customers.

abilities.name: Customer Tracking
abilities.description: Automatically record and recall information about every customer.

abilities.name: Personal Service
abilities.description: Enhanced ability to provide personalized service to returning customers.

name: Shopkeeper's Apron of Many Pockets
location: Merchant clothing suppliers, utility gear vendors, shopkeeper essentials stores
description:
This practical canvas apron has an seemingly impossible number of pockets, each enchanted to hold exactly what the shopkeeper needs at any given moment. Tools, samples, and small items appear when needed.

Mechanics: The apron has 20 extradimensional pockets. You can pull any mundane item worth 1 gp or less from a pocket as a bonus action, 3 times per day. The apron also provides resistance to damage from spilled substances.

abilities.name: Convenient Storage
abilities.description: Pull needed tools and small items from pockets as a bonus action.

abilities.name: Workplace Protection
abilities.description: Resistance to damage from common shop hazards and spills.

name: Bell of Customer Alerting
location: Shop fixture suppliers, customer service equipment vendors, small business essentials
description:
This brass bell chimes melodically whenever a potential customer approaches the shop, even alerting to their general mood and intent. It helps shopkeepers provide appropriate service levels.

Mechanics: The bell rings when anyone approaches within 60 feet with intent to enter or conduct business. The tone indicates the visitor's general disposition: cheerful for friendly, somber for serious business, sharp for hostile intent.

abilities.name: Customer Detection
abilities.description: Alerts when potential customers approach with different tones for different moods.

abilities.name: Mood Indicator
abilities.description: Tone reveals whether approaching person is friendly, serious, or hostile.

name: Inventory Crystal of Tracking
location: Magical inventory systems, large merchant operations, warehouse management suppliers
description:
This multifaceted crystal hovers near the ceiling of a shop and tracks the location and quantity of every item in the inventory. It provides real-time updates on stock levels and can locate any specific item instantly.

Mechanics: The crystal knows the location and quantity of every item in a building up to 10,000 square feet. You can mentally query it to find any specific item instantly. It alerts you when stock runs low (below 10% of normal levels).

abilities.name: Perfect Inventory
abilities.description: Track exact location and quantity of every item in your shop.

abilities.name: Instant Location
abilities.description: Find any specific item immediately through mental query.

name: Contracts of Binding Agreement
location: Legal document suppliers, contract law firms, merchant protection services
description:
This portfolio contains blank contracts that magically enforce their terms once signed by all parties. The contracts prevent violations and ensure fair dealing in business transactions.

Mechanics: Once a contract is signed, all parties are compelled to follow its terms (Wisdom save DC 15 to resist taking actions that would violate the contract). The contract glows if someone attempts to break it, and violations cause psychic discomfort.

abilities.name: Magical Enforcement
abilities.description: Compel parties to honor signed agreements through magical compulsion.

abilities.name: Breach Warning
abilities.description: Immediately detect when someone attempts to violate contract terms.

name: Counting Frame of Rapid Calculation
location: Accounting tool vendors, mathematical instrument shops, efficiency consultants
description:
This ornate abacus performs complex calculations instantly and helps with all forms of mathematical business operations. The beads move on their own to show results and prevent calculation errors.

Mechanics: The counting frame performs any mathematical calculation instantly and accurately. You gain advantage on Intelligence checks related to mathematics, accounting, or financial planning. It can calculate complex inventory values, taxes, and profit margins automatically.

abilities.name: Mathematical Mastery
abilities.description: Perform complex business calculations instantly without error.

abilities.name: Financial Analysis
abilities.description: Advantage on all mathematical and accounting-related Intelligence checks.
